Name: HELL BOUND MONSTERS
About the game: Hell Bound Monsters is a TPS survivor game where the goal is not to get us an angel of hell. Everyone goes to hell if they do something wrong. Demons come out of hell and suck your soul out. What do you think you deserve to get to heaven? Your job is to get the crosses on the field so you can be forgiven. If you fail, the demons will suck your soul to take you to hell. Rules of the game: - You can be a man who goes to hell if you don't collect the right number of crosses and you avoid the Demons sucking your soul out and going to hell - You can also be a Demon who comes straight from hell and takes the people who are there. People who are in hell will find you on the field with a red glossy marking. All you have to do is gather the right number of people to hell. Support us by purchasing the game and we will create it in multiplayer mode.
